patchNotes.title: Banditos vs. Gangsters
highlights: Various bug fixes and performance improvements

changes: Healing and Shielding Power increased from 5 to 8
Attack Damage bonus increased from 90 to 120
Bonus gold per stack increased from 50 to 150
Healing and Shielding Power reduced from 15% to 12%
Level 10 Talent "Safe Base": Damage reduction increased from 30% to 40%

Level 5 Talent "Healing Balls" replaced with "Defensive Stance": Shoma converts 25% of his Attack Damage into armor and magic resistance while holding a ball, with additional effects based on ball type
Attack Damage growth reduced from 7 to 6.5
Q "Whirling Kick" damage reduced at later ranks: 100/210/425/650/880 â†’ 100/210/380/550/750
Level 20 Talent "Arcane Overflow": Double damage chance reduced from 25% to 15%

sections.title: Bug Fixes
content: Improved performance in team fights with multiple particle effects
Fixed several UI issues in the item shop
